Research

Research Program

My research program aims to define how physiological and sociophonetic properties—dialect, gender, etc.—determine the fine acoustic details of speech production. To this purpose, I employ experimental methods and methods from signal processing and machine learning. Below, I summarize the main trends of my current research: prosody, vowels and consonants, speech pathology, language acquisition and diglossia, and writing and speech. I conclude, with some ideas for future research.
